ygData.subject: RE: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I swear there is code that says if you are about to level or just have leveled, it acts like a taunt...  :-) Do you know about the emergency exit from the
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:
>
> 6. Don't ever level when camping in a room or the Festering hag will come
> by to congratulate you =).
>
> That happened to me last night as soon as I got my ding for my level I
> look up and see my health bar drop from 5 bubbles to two bubbles in a
> matter of seconds. What appeared? A festering hag coming to congratualte
> me on my level 25. Was I singing a song? NOpe I was actually doing
> nothing at the time =).

I swear there is code that says if you are about to level or
just have leveled, it acts like a taunt... :-)

Do you know about the emergency exit from the hand room? Out
the door to the roof, then jump down to the main path leading
to the zone. Your safefall should prevent you from taking any
damage from the jump.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
